content.text: The Atoan were a sentient humanoid species from the Atoan system. The race possessed an outward appearance that resembled base-line Humans, though their internal structure lacked a heart, rather having numerous "hearts" throughout their bodies. Atoans spoke their native language rather than Galactic Basic Standard.
